attributes.action: Look into sales calls via telephones and restrict what these companies can do/offer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have recently had over 10 sales calls a day to my mobile to try and sell me items which can be a pain, especially when your phone rings every 10 minutes in meetings from these companies. Essentially, I feel they are nusance calls and should be tightly regulated.
